## 终端

```         
查看版本
quarto -v
```

查看附加工具

```         
quarto list tools
```

#### TinyTex pdf

[A lightweight, cross-platform, portable, and easy-to-maintain LaTeX distribution based on TeX Live](https://yihui.org/tinytex/)

```         
quarto install tinytex 
quarto update tinytex
```

```{r}
# CRAN version
install.packages('tinytex')

# or the development version on GitHub
# remotes::install_github('rstudio/tinytex')

```

#### 添加到环境变量

```         
quarto install tinytex --update-path
```

#### Chromium html

```         
quarto install Chromium

quarto update Chromium
```
